survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users about their satisfaction with home internet service reliability, including uptime, speed consistency, and customer support responsiveness.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall reliability of your home internet service?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clear feedback. Ensure mobile-friendly layout for buttons.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio buttons. Randomize option order to avoid bias.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall reliability of your home internet service?

questions.question_text: How often do you experience unexpected downtime or outages with your home internet service?
questions.client_notes: Use a frequency scale for measurable insights. Consider adding a 'Not sure' option if needed.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio buttons. Ensure options are mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: How often do you experience unexpected downtime or outages with your home internet service?

questions.question_text: Which of the following issues have you encountered with your home internet service? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Include a 'None of the above' option to capture respondents without issues. Multi-select format.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice checkboxes. Randomize option order except for 'None of the above'.

script.question_text: Which of the following issues have you encountered with your home internet service? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason you chose your current home internet service provider?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for detailed responses. Single-choice format.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio buttons with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What is the primary reason you chose your current home internet service provider?

questions.question_text: How would you describe your experience with your internet provider's customer support?
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected 'Poor customer support responsiveness' in Q3 or 'Dissatisfied'/'Very dissatisfied' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for nuanced feedback. Route based on prior dissatisfaction.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio buttons. Ensure conditional logic is correctly implemented.

script.question_text: How would you describe your experience with your internet provider's customer support?
script.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected 'Poor customer support responsiveness' in Q3 or 'Dissatisfied'/'Very dissatisfied' in Q1

questions.question_text: If you could change one thing about your home internet service, what would it be?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question for qualitative insights. Limit response length to 250 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Open-text field with character limit. Ensure mobile-friendly input.

script.question_text: If you could change one thing about your home internet service, what would it be?
